header_text: You want to talk to someone about your plans for the future, but don't want to talk to your family about it. You think about other close people in your life, and decide to talk to your closest friend. When you think about their reaction, you think they will probably be encouraging.

elements.Text: Do you feel worried about talking to your friends about your plans for the future?
